column4: Musk to buy $20 million in Tesla stock
column5: Tesla Inc  Chief Executive Officer Elon Musk will purchase company stock worth $20 million in the next open trading session  the electric carmaker said in a filing on Wednesday.
Electric carmaker Tesla Inc  has seen a flurry of senior executives leave the company in recent months.

column4: Tesla's vice president of manufacturing departs: Business Insider
column5: Tesla Inc's  vice president of manufacturing  Gilbert Passin  has left the company  Business Insider reported on Wednesday  citing a source familiar with the situation.

column4: U.S. Senate bill could give Tesla  GM electric car tax credit boost
column5: WASHINGTON Tesla Inc  and General Motors Co   which have lobbied Congress to lift a cap on electric vehicles eligible for a $7 500 tax credit  could get their way for up to four years under a new proposal from a Republican senator.
